Name: Cube Space
About the game: Cube Space is a minimalist arcade Shoot `em Up game set in space. You control a spaceship and your task is to score as many points as possible by destroying enemies and obstacles in your path. Any collision or being hit by enemy fire will be fatal so be vigilant. Over time, the pace of the game accelerates and the number of enemies increases, and you will have to try not to die.
